bind.title: Account Binding
bind.desc:
Bind your Hoyo account to your discord account
This will allow the bot to access your game data or HoyoLab data
bind.short_desc: Bind your Hoyo account to your discord account
bind.srbind: Bind your in-game UID with your discord account, this bot support multiple UID binding.
bind.srhoyobind:
Bind your HoyoLab account with your discord account, only support one account.
Please see [here](https://github.com/naoTimesdev/qingque-gamba/wiki/HoyoLab) for more info.

profiles.title: Profiles
profiles.srprofile:
See your profile card, you can also see other people by providing their UID.
This will show the same four characters you set on your Trailblaze Profile
profiles.srchronicle: See your battle chronicle overview data. Make sure you bind both your UID and HoyoLab account for this.

help.placeholder: Please select one of the help menu...
